title: Crowds moving to Galle Face to Protest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest is currently underway with the participation of a large number of people at Galle Face, Colombo.
News 1st Correspondents said that a large number of people including, professionals and the youth are participating in this major protest.
Tri-Forces assistance sought to aid Police when necessary: Public Defense Ministry
